name: IP_CP_TIMEMARK
description: This table no longer contains accurate information about Care Plan Review / Documentation data. Table CAREPLAN_TIMEMARK can be used instead of this table.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the inpatient data store record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.

columns.name: EDIT_TIME
columns.description: The instant Care Plan was  edited ( e.g. Document or Review )
